overview: The chilling tale of the Joyce Reatdon, an obsessed psychology professor who commissions a team of psychics and a gifted 15-year old autistic girl, Annie Wheaton, to literally wake up a supposedly dormant haunted mansion - Rose Red.  Their efforts unleash myriad spirits and uncover horrifying secrets of the generations who have lived and died there.
tagline: Every house has a story to tell...This one will kill you
title: Stephen King's: Rose Red
